title: Getting Started with Cucumber Testing in Java
content: Cucumber is a popular open-source tool that supports Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) for testing software applications in Java. BDD emphasizes collaboration between developers, testers, and stakeholders by writing test scenarios in a readable, plain English language called Gherkin.
